attributes.action: require all packages of Plaster of Paris to carry warnings of the terrible injuries that can result when making large casts of the human form
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Plaster of Paris releases heat when it sets. If parts of the body are trapped this can have disastrous consequences.

Recently there was a tragic accident in which a child lost most of her fingers.

Worse things can happen.  There have been cases where a person has been cooked alive, their friends unable to release them from the ghastly grip of the rapidly setting material.

It would be simple to print a warning on every packet.
"Beware. This material liberates heat. Ensure that no body parts are trapped while making casts".
This would rapidly become part of Art teachers folklore, potentially saving life and limb.

It is not always obvious to members of the public what is the most effective way to implement change.
That is the expertise of the politician.
Perhaps all that is needed is advice to distributors from the HSE

Please help us find the simplest and most effective way to bring about this change, so that this kind of horrific accident never happens again.
